thread.title: Three days of 83 degrees forecast for Sacramento

author:

title: Three days of 83 degrees forecast for Sacramento
text:
Three days of 83 degrees forecast for Sacramento 
The high on Monday was 76 degrees in Sacramento 
By Bill Lindelof 
blindelof@sacbee.com 
Warmer conditions are forecast for Tuesday in Sacramento as a high pressure system exerts it influence. 
The high on Monday was 76 degrees, which is just about normal for mid-to-late October. Temperatures are about to heat up some with 83 degrees forecast to be the high for the next three days. 
High temperatures expected for Tuesday: 
â–ª Sacramento: 83 degrees 
The detailed, seven-day forecast from the NWS for the Sacramento region: 
Tuesday: Sunny, with a high near 83. North-northwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. 
Tuesday night: Clear, with a low around 56. North-northwest wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. 
Wednesday: Sunny, with a high near 83. North wind 3 to 6 mph. 
Wednesday night: Mostly clear, with a low around 56. Calm wind. 
Thursday: Mostly sunny, with a high near 83. Calm wind. 
Thursday night: Mostly clear, with a low around 56. 
Friday: Sunny, with a high near 81. 
Friday night: Mostly clear, with a low around 58. 
Saturday: Mostly sunny, with a high near 83. 
Saturday night: Mostly clear, with a low around 56. 
Sunday: Mostly sunny, with a high near 82. 
Sunday night: Partly cloudy, with a low around 58. 
Monday: Mostly sunny, with a high near 83.
